com.SupNews.UI

Class DashboardController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.SupNews.UI.DashboardController

  • public class DashboardController
extends java.lang.Object

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) javafx.scene.control.TextArea content_box 
      private byte[] imagebyte_box 
      (package private) javafx.scene.control.ListView listOfArticles 
      (package private) javafx.scene.control.TextField title_box 
      private int u_id 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DashboardController() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add_image_btn_click(javafx.event.ActionEvent Event)
      used to prompt user to select an image using a file chooser the image is converted to a byte array using Files.readAllBytes(Path)
      void chg_usr_btn_click(javafx.event.ActionEvent Event)
      allows to change user without having to restart app each time
      void click_listview()
      whenever the user clicks an element in the listview the contents of the dashboard are updated, ie title_box,content_box,imagebyte_box
      void delete_btn_click(javafx.event.ActionEvent Event)
      delete the selected article from the listOfArticles and database
      void init_u_id(int id)
      this is used to initialize the value of u_id
      void initialize()
      initialize is called automatically on instantiation of a DashboardController
      void preview_btn_click(javafx.event.ActionEvent Event)
      opens a new window(from preview.fxml) and initializes all its fx forms using PreviewController.initData(Article) based on information displayed in the title_box and content_box
      void save_btn_pressed(javafx.event.ActionEvent Event)
      first will check if title is not empty, then if user has not selected any Article in the listOfArticles the contents of title_box,content_box,imagebyte_box will be pushed to database else if an article is selected from listOfArticles saving will overwrite the content of the article by id else if the user left the title empty an Alert will be shown to the user
      private void updateListView()
      method used to update the listOfArticles whenever we want to, example a button press

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • init_u_id

        public void init_u_id(int id)
        this is used to initialize the value of u_id
        Parameters:
        id - this method takes the user_id of the user which has logged in

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        initialize is called automatically on instantiation of a DashboardController

      • add_image_btn_click

        public void add_image_btn_click(javafx.event.ActionEvent Event)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        used to prompt user to select an image using a file chooser the image is converted to a byte array using Files.readAllBytes(Path)
        Parameters:
        Event - ActionEvent Event button click
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - throw IOException

      • delete_btn_click

        public void delete_btn_click(javafx.event.ActionEvent Event)
        delete the selected article from the listOfArticles and database
        Parameters:
        Event - ActionEvent Event button click

      • preview_btn_click

        public void preview_btn_click(javafx.event.ActionEvent Event)
        opens a new window(from preview.fxml) and initializes all its fx forms using PreviewController.initData(Article) based on information displayed in the title_box and content_box
        Parameters:
        Event - ActionEvent Event button click

      • save_btn_pressed

        public void save_btn_pressed(javafx.event.ActionEvent Event)
        first will check if title is not empty, then if user has not selected any Article in the listOfArticles the contents of title_box,content_box,imagebyte_box will be pushed to database else if an article is selected from listOfArticles saving will overwrite the content of the article by id else if the user left the title empty an Alert will be shown to the user
        Parameters:
        Event - ActionEvent Event button click

      • click_listview

        public void click_listview()
        whenever the user clicks an element in the listview the contents of the dashboard are updated, ie title_box,content_box,imagebyte_box

      • updateListView

        private void updateListView()
        method used to update the listOfArticles whenever we want to, example a button press

      • chg_usr_btn_click

        public void chg_usr_btn_click(javafx.event.ActionEvent Event)
        allows to change user without having to restart app each time
        Parameters:
        Event - ActionEvent Event button click
